hand-sway.title: Hand Sway
hand-sway.option.armDeviation.tooltip: How different the sway is between the left and right.
hand-sway.option.invertOtherArm.tooltip: Make the other arm the exact opposite sway.
hand-sway.option.xSpeedModifier.tooltip: How fast the X axis sways.
hand-sway.option.xIntensityDampener.tool: How much the intensity of the X axis should be dampened.
hand-sway.option.ySpeedModifier.tooltip: How fast the Y axis sways.
hand-sway.option.yIntensityDampener.tool: How much the intensity of the Y axis should be dampened.
